channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Applications DBA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Applications DBA

item.title: CVE-2018-2580|2024-08-05T04:21:34.409Z -- oracle%20corporation -- applications%20dba
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Applications DBA component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: ADPatch). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.3, 12.2.3, 12.2.4, 12.2.5, 12.2.6 and 12.2.7. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Oracle Applications DBA executes to compromise Oracle Applications DBA. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Applications DBA accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.4 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2017-3562|2024-08-05T14:30:58.172Z -- oracle%20corporation -- applications%20dba
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Applications DBA component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: AD Utilities). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.3, 12.2.3, 12.2.4, 12.2.5 and 12.2.6. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Applications DBA. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Oracle Applications DBA accessible data as well as unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Applications DBA accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).
